data.name: Mysteria of the World: The forest of Death Artbook
data.detailed_description: A colorful artbook that reveals all aspects of the world of "Mystery of the World: The forest of Death" and tells about all the references in the game. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark fairy tale with drawings by Keaneash and aerynn.
data.about_the_game: A colorful artbook that reveals all aspects of the world of "Mystery of the World: The forest of Death" and tells about all the references in the game. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark fairy tale with drawings by Keaneash and aerynn.
data.short_description: A colorful artbook that reveals all aspects of the world of "Mystery of the World: The forest of Death" and tells about all the references in the game. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark fairy tale with drawings by Keaneash and aerynn.
